mapper.sql: CASE when t.flowType = '0' then (select fullName from fop.fop_company where id = t.fromId) when t.flowType = '1' then (select fullName from fop.fop_association where id = t.fromId) END as requestName , t.id, t.fromId, t.flowType, t.personId, t.auditResult, t.auditOpinion, t.auditDate, t.remark, t.status, t.createUserId, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.lastModifyUserId, t.lastModifyUserName, t.lastModifyDate
